name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WebTracer - A productivity tool to track your screen time

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple extension that tracks your screen time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep a track of your daily browsing activity.
A simple chrome extension that keeps track of how much time you spend on the web everyday.

🚀 Features:
    1️⃣ Total active daily screen time
    2️⃣ A list of the websites you visited and its duration (descending order)
    3️⃣ Reset and clear your activity details at any time
    4️⃣ Your data will automatically reset at midnight

📒 Important Notes:
    🔼 WebTracer will only display websites that you have spent longer than 1 minute browsing.
    🔼 If you are visiting multiple websites at the same time (on multiple chrome windows), 
          WebTracer will track each website individually. 

WebTracer will only track your activity when your session is active and it won't track any browsing done in Incognito mode - no need to worry about your privacy or any unnecessary tracking.

🔒 Permissions:
   ⚙️ Tabs: This allows the extension to read the tabs that are active in your session. It will not  
         change any your browser's history or access any other sensitive information.

Download for free - no ads! 

Made by David Kim 👨🏻‍💻
